SummaryEnglish: The story follows the skilled hunter Kikuru Madan, who has decided to retire out of fear of wasting his youth. One day, a guild staff member suggests that he go on a quest with a new female martial artist named Hitamu Kyan. However, she keeps getting hit by monsters one after another.

1.TitleEnglish: 『不徳のギルド』最終回直前！不徳の大集会スペシャル！
1.SummaryEnglish:
2022/12/25(日) 05:30～06:00
ＡＴ－Ｘ
『不徳のギルド』最終回直前！不徳の大集会スペシャル！

＜出演＞福原かつみ、礒部花凜、渋谷彩乃、鎌倉有那、白砂沙帆 /(VTR)大地葉

詳細情報
＜番組内容＞
最終回直前ということで、主要キャストが集結し、今だから話せるあんなことやこんなことまでとことん語りつくします!不徳な(?)トークコーナーのほかにも、ギルドの絆が試されるバラエティコーナーなど、盛り沢山の30分。最終回が楽しみになることはもちろん、これまでのエピソードもまた見返したくなること間違いなし...!?

1.TitleEnglish: I'll Do My Best! / Her First Step Into a New World
1.SummaryEnglish: Hitamuki’s skills impressed Kikuru. Then he realized her lack of self-preservation gets her into trouble in more ways than one. It’s going to be a long training session…

2.TitleEnglish: A Bolt from the Blue / Hunter in Peril
2.SummaryEnglish: Before Kikuru knew it, he was in charge of four trainees. And as luck would have it, all of them have their own specific issues that need ironing out.

3.TitleEnglish: Let's All Hang Out / You're My First
3.SummaryEnglish: With the four heroines incapable of teamwork, Kikuru suggests they take the day off to bond with each other. Which gives him time to ponder the unusual behavior of monsters.

4.SummaryEnglish: Kikuru agrees to impersonate a doctor to help cover for a nurse’s mistake. And by pure coincidence, his four trainees need to undergo physical exams.

5.TitleEnglish: The Secret of Berserk / A Feast of Flesh
5.SummaryEnglish: Kikuru tries to help Hanabata understand she can’t always rely on her berserker rage in a fight. Which, for all intents and purposes, is easier said than done.

6.SummaryEnglish: Whose bright idea was it to send the mages on a quest to gather flowers that inflict the mute debuff? It should be obvious what would happen next.

7.SummaryEnglish: The team heads out to slay the fearsome swift spider! And, of course, things end up like they always do because why wouldn’t it?

8.SummaryEnglish: Kikuru and Toxico will have their revenge against the swift spider, and nothing will stop them this time! Hopefully…

9.SummaryEnglish: Kikuru and Hitamuki take a new recruit on a quest to hunt monsters.

10.SummaryEnglish: Chaos is Kikuru’s new normal, and he’s had enough. When he decides to confide in Hanabata, the warrior misinterprets his intentions for something else entirely.

11.SummaryEnglish: Maidena and Toxico belong to two different factions constantly at odds with each other. Now the conflict boils over. Again. For a really stupid reason.

12.TitleEnglish: I Don't Want to Come Home Today / The Little Mystery Solver
12.SummaryEnglish: After getting their first paychecks, the four heroines wish to pay Kikuru back for all his help. It’s a nice sentiment, but things obviously don’t go as planned…
